content: Enzymes are responsible for digestion, respiration, photosynthesis, and metabolism. They are responsible for forming all of us and keeping us alive. They are the engines of life.
translations: ita:Gli enzimi sono responsabili della digestione, della respirazione, della fotosintesi e del metabolismo. Sono responsabil
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
